subj-group.subject: Forecasting and Evaluation: Practices and Performance

title-group.article-title: An Examination of the Accuracy of Earnings Forecasts

abstract.p: This paper provides additional information regarding the usefulness of the corporate earnings forecasts of analysts. The accuracy of such forecasts is evaluated by comparing them to the accuracy of forecasts generated by "naive" mechanical models. Additionally, forecast errors are studied for various industries.
